hero_sub: Beaches, Lungomare promenade, Učka trails, gastronomy & day trips.
about_p: A charming coastal town next to Opatija — historic streets, pebble beaches, and the famous seaside promenade.
do: Old town of Lovran (loggias, narrow alleys, St. George church)
Hike the Učka Nature Park (Vojak viewpoint)
SUP or kayak along the coastline
